backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend feature modifications and their related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus custom OKLCH color variables and reduced‑motion‑aware animations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading romantic fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/components/FinalReveal.tsx: Component that shows a 'Say Yes' button and reveals a final romantic message after interaction.
frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.t: Main page composing all sections, decorations, animations, and updated Love Letter content with floating heart.
Renders corner roses and animated or static falling petals depending on motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper section that triggers scroll‑reveal animations using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity management logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user’s prefers‑reduced‑motion setting via media queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for query hooks with no functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to reveal elements on scroll, with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom rose‑themed CSS variables, typography, utilities, and motion/contrast adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges Tailwind classes using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current romantic one‑page site design, features, and requirements.
